price: Yolun doğrusunu göstermek Allah’a aittir. Eğri yol da vardır. Eğer dileseydi hepinize hidayet ederdi.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you
